Articles.Content: You know how people put flag things and their cars. I want to do that to a rover. If it is possible to plant a flag on a part please tell me how.
You could make a part mod with interstellar fuel switch and have a flag model that has the texture change with a flag, and place it on a rover.
It is not, without modding the game. Your post will therefore be moved to the modding section, in the hopes that someone there will recommend something for you.

Try this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46856-0-21-1-Flag-Decals-and-Flagpole-New-File-Structure?highlight=flag+decal

It has about everything you need.

Try this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46856-0-21-1-Flag-Decals-and-Flagpole-New-File-Structure?highlight=flag+decal

It has about everything you need.

Its spaceport link is, of course, dorked. However I believe someone uploaded it to curse so I'll try and find that.

Found it! link

However I use it and I will note that the deploying flagpole has the flags on backwards, it is especially noticable with, say the American flag, or the default KSP flag.
